scripts.check:all: npm run env:check && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean:check:build: npm run clean && npm run check:all && npm run build
scripts.clean:check:dev: npm run clean && npm run check:all && npm run dev
scripts.setup: echo 'Set the OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable to use AI parsing'
scripts.env:check: test -f .env && echo '.env file exists' || echo '.env file does not exist. Run npm run env:copy to create it.'
